programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep43
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Petani Milenial Cintanya Kearifan Lokal
programme.desc: Siapa kata petani mesti orang tua? Malah golongan yang berjiwa juga bersemangat untuk menjadi petani, dan Dadang adalah salah seorang daripada mereka. Tambahan pula, dia menjadi lebih bersemangat selepas kedatangan Kia, seorang doktor cantik di kampungnya. Ternyata Kia mempunyai misi khas. Apa agaknya?

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep2
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Keajaiban Cinta Ep2
programme.desc: Siri ini diarahkan oleh Gita Asmara dan dibintangi oleh Aliando Syarief, Sitha Marino, dan Erdin Werdrayana. Kisah Keajaiban Cinta berkisar tentang Darwin (lakonan Aliando Syarief) dan Tiana (lakonan Sitha Marino). Mereka menghadapi pertikaian keluarga yang menghalang hubungan mereka. Darwin telah ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya sejak kecil.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep65
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Ratu Lapak Cintanya Free Ongkir
programme.desc: Gita, seorang pereka fesyen, bertungkus-lumus mencari model lelaki untuk mewakilinya dalam pertandingan Citayem Fashion Week. Akhirnya, dia terserempak dengan Haikal, bekasnya, yang mungkin boleh menjadi modelnya. Mereka akhirnya jatuh cinta semula kerana masih mengambil berat antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep137
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Keajaiban Cinta Ep3

programme.title: Iris: The Movie
programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: Long Live The King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: A Tiger In Winter
programme.desc: On a winter day, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's apartment. He then begins a job as a substitute driver at night. One night, he meets his ex-girlfriend who now works as a novelist.

programme.title: You Are My Sunshine
programme.desc: The marital bliss of Seok-jung and Eun-ha was threatened as Eun-ha was tested positive for HIV and met her abusive ex-husband again...

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class

programme.title: The Witness
programme.desc: One night at his apartment, a father witnesses a crime scene through his living room window and the killer starts to search for him and eliminate his only witness of that night.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husbands funeral.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: The President's Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon And The Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Countdown (2023)
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: Tazza: One Eyed Jack
programme.desc: A young poker joins a poker team lead by the legendary One-Eyed Jack to pay off his debt, but a single mistake puts the entire team in a life-or-death situation.

programme.title: Sympathy For Lady Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman planned revenge against her teacher after being wrongfully imprisoned for 13 years.

programme.title: Missing You
programme.desc: When Hee-Joo was 7 years old, her father was murdered. The killer, Ki-Bum, was eventually arrested. Hee-Joo has waited patiently for Ki-Bum's release.

programme.title: Mal-Mo-E: The Secret Mission
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation in the 1940s, two men work together to secretly create a dictionary of the Korean language when the language was banned.

programme.title: Iris: The Movie
programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: Unbowed
programme.desc: A math professor was not re-hired for pointing out errors in the university entrance exam. Losing the lawsuit against the university, he carries his crossbow to the judge for justice.

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.

programme.title: Decision To Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: Sleep
programme.desc: A man turns into a different person in sleep every night ever since he murmurs something strange, bringing fear and danger to his wife and their soon-to-be-born child...

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husbands funeral.

programme.title: The Battleship Island

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep42
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2188
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep205
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chefs delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: Si Ling, a pregnant painter, moves into her dream home after winning an award and hires a confinement nanny. As she begins her one-month confinement after giving birth to her daughter, inexplicable incidents start happening in the house, threatening both her and her baby

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her fathers underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macaus economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis, his marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: High Risk
programme.desc: After failing to save his wife, Kit resigned as a cop and becomes the bodyguard and stunt double for a cowardly action film star, Frankie. When attending a jewel exhibition, they run into a band of robbers. Kit identifies the murderer of his wife amongst them and chases after him. Will Frankie regain his courage to help Kit?

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tangs demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tangs strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jins pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wifes death.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wongs disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind

programme.title: Till The End Of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: Ode To Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponents son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chans elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperors tomb.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one. Imagine Bob Hope and Bing Crosby with the skills of Jet Li and Jackie Chan, and youve got an idea of the fun and fury inherent in this delightful tale of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. Add to the mix a Shaolin monk (played by "Master Killer" Gordon Liu Chia-hui), a powerfully brutal villain, and his equally dangerous mute sister (future director Yang Tsing-tsing), and youve got one of the most internationally loved kung-fu capers ever made.

programme.title: Melody Of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s a-go-go era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his bride use the deadly weapon - Phoenix Lute to fight against evil, but the lute accidentally falls into the hands of bandits hoping to use it to take control of the province. Gui Wu must now fight to recover the lute and beat the bandits.

programme.title: Carry On Doctors And Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Challenge Of The Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his fathers martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hungs passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lus disciple.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his wife Gan Lian Zhu are the famous Twin Swords in the martial arts world. One day, they stumble upon a kidnapping plot at the Red Lotus Temple and Lian Zhu is held captive. Wu successfully escapes to find the Gan family for help, not knowing that he is sending them into an ambush by the kidnappers. Can he finally save Lian Zhu?

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: New Tales Of The Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.desc: Tamil action Film, Starring - Vijay Sethupathy & Anjali

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep1
programme.desc: An all-American candy company makes 200,000 packages of red licorice every day; a zippy mayonnaise packs the punch of spicy Sriracha; 40,000 Turkish bourekas are produced every day; and Laceys feature a chocolate centre sandwiched between two wafer-thin cookies.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep2
programme.desc: 1.8 million cherry chews are produced from just one single batch; massive silos of wheat are transformed into 'elbow' macaroni pasta; a continental cranberry cheesecake first started as a Christmas experiment; and meet chakri, the exotic southeast Asian snack that's hand-twirled and fried to crispy perfection.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Wildlife cameraman, Gordon Buchanan leads a team using specially designed on board cameras to film ground-breaking new behaviour in some of Australia's most iconic creatures.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tahiti - Joel Dommett and Nish Kumar go up against the rock lifters of Tahiti in a strongman competition on the remote island of Rurutu, where events include a fruit race and a dance off.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep17
programme.desc: Run Aground - Alaskans are in the home stretch of preparing for the upcoming winter.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Ed Helms - Actor Ed Helms faces sheer cliffs, crumbling rock and a cringeworthy dinner menu while atop Colorado mountains; Helms discusses the road to his career in comedy.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Heat Ep3
programme.desc: Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Stinkers Ep1
programme.desc: In nature, the right stench can mean the difference between life or death. Meet nature's odor-equipped inhabitants, from vomiting grasshoppers to dung-flinging hippos, and even a flower that's adapted to smell like death.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africas most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Path of the Matriarch Ep10
programme.desc: In the forests of southern India, the relentless heat of the summer brings challenges for Asian elephants, who need to drink every day. As the water starts to disappear around her, a wise old matriarch called Anura decides its time to lead her family on the yearly migration to ensure their survival. Her journey is made all the more important as theres a new addition to the herd - her 3-month-old grandson Navin. This may also be one of her last chances to ensure she passes on all her knowledge, gained over a lifetime, to the younger members of her family.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Invasion Begins Ep1
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Heat Ep3
programme.desc: Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africas most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Joined at the Hip Ep4
programme.desc: The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler monkey youngsters.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.desc: The sprawling primate family includes animals as different as monkeys, lemurs and humans. Follow primate babies to see how they bond with their mothers, learn to socialize, and adapt to an ever-changing environment.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teachers pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - Snake Prison Island Ep1
programme.desc: Gorgona was once home to Colombias Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the islands stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths whove now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Ice Ep4
programme.desc: Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - A Penguin Proposal Ep1
programme.desc: Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Ugly Ep3
programme.desc: Gawk at some of the worlds ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but theyre evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South America Ep7
programme.desc: From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - March of the Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: On the island of Providencia, a black crab begins the mission of her life, escorting 80,000 eggs from her home, on a 3 km hike to the coast. Join her, and millions of her clan, on a journey fraught with danger, where chances of survival are slim.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the oceans vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gallipoli - Gino is in the city of Gallipoli. He joins a diver on her small boat as they head to the sea caves. She forages for red oysters which they eat with a glass of rose. Gino heads into town and tries out Scapece, a dish of fish in saffron and of religious significance in the city. Inspired by the the saffron and fresh fish, Gino demonstrates the Puglian classic Tiella, the Italian answer to paella, made with mussels, rice and potatoes.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2014
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2014 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep6
programme.desc: A Ball-For-All - It's Ball-entines Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. But unfortunately, the town is fresh out, so Tag and Scooch set sail for Ball Island. \ If Tag and Scooch want to leave Ball Island with the balls they chose for their family, they must earn them by proving themselves ball-worthy, through a series of challenges from The Fetcher.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Jigsaw Puzzle Pieces - When some pieces from Big Ears' jigsaw puzzle go missing, Noddy investigates: where are the missing pieces? He soon realises someone must have taken them and draws up a list of suspects. Having discounted the Pirates and then the Naughticorns, Noddy is baffled. But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasn't one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece. Cloppycorn, Deltoid, Smartysaurus and Carlton all admit they took one piece. They didn't think they were doing any harm! Big Ears gets all the missing pieces back and everyone is at last able to enjoy his jigsaw puzzle of Toyland. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep32
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Whistle Worries - Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep44
programme.desc: He Got Game Night/73 - Turbo tries to juggle two dates at a party without being caught; White Shadow takes Skid's advice on superstitions to keep his winning streak alive.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep44
programme.desc: Garby's Gang - Garby has to develop confidence as a leader when he's left in charge of the Flatirons while Ty and the others are stuck far away from home.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep44
programme.desc: Big Bad Love / The Milk Job - When Tip and Oh bring Fox and Pom Pom together, the baddies get badder/When Oh agrees to be Donny's wingman for a job, Donny introduces him to a shady underworld

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girls plans to attend the Governors Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep37
programme.desc: Bait With Destiny / Sappy Together - Eep gets jealous when Thunk is invited to join the hunters/Grug and Gran must work together after getting stuck to each other with sticky tree sap

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep38
programme.desc: Scare Tactics / Disturbiahhh! - Grug has Thunk use "scare tactics" to get the Valley to defend against the Broods/Eep thinks Snoot is holding Ahhh! Valleyites captive in his cave

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroups other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep28
programme.desc: The Museum Job - When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first missionand then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep70
programme.desc: A Gruff Separation - The twins are preparing for their birthday when they are visited by a notoriously mischievous relative administering the Thorston Rite of Passage challenges

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where's My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep70
programme.desc: Squad Goals - When King Juliens consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool King Julien decides to get a whole new crew

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep17
programme.desc: Cleopatra Needs Space - Akila and Brian are having major romance drama and Cleo HAS to get away from it. She gets captured by Space Scavengers, but its still kind of an improvement.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep18
programme.desc: School Break - When Akila invites Cleo home for school break, she has to compete for her parents attention.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep35
programme.desc: Reunion - Armed with new intel on her brother Matt's whereabouts Pidge sets out on a solo mission

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep36
programme.desc: Black Site - Zarkon awakens from his coma and orders that Lotor is to be relieved of his duties, but Lotor is nowhere to be found

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep37
programme.desc: Telethon / Enrico Caruso - When Sherman makes a million-dollar pledge to his school's charity to win an awesome video game, he didn't realize they actually expect him to pay

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep38
programme.desc: Spooktacular / Nicolas-Joseph Cugnot - When Peabody and Sherman accidentally drink a mad scientist's potion, they turn into hideous monsters and put on the spookiest and scariest show ever

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep9
programme.desc: The Dark Side of the Moose: Chapter Four - Bullwinkle reunites Cloyd with his parents who then take him to outer space to stop Fearless Leader and rescue Rocky

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep10
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter One - Eager to come face-to-face with a real life monster, Rocky and Bullwinkle buy a creepy old mansion in hopes of finding a real monster

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep37
programme.desc: The Tooth Pirate / Zups - When Archibald loses his last baby tooth, he wants to hold onto it forever. But in a bizarre dream, the dastardly Tooth Pirate steals it and Archibald must set out on a high seas adventure to get it back. / Archibald and Sage go door-to-door selling specialty ketchups for a Rooster Ranger Fundraiser.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep38
programme.desc: A Star Is Hatched / Say Cheese - After stumbling into Finlys music performance, Archibalds unique sound leads to a hit record. But as the pressures of fame and success loom over the band, they struggle to recreate that "Archibald sound" and recapture lightning in a bottle. / When the Strutters need a family portrait, they meet a burnt out photographer named Randy. After accidentally wrecking his studio, Archibald decides hes going to help Randy rekindle his passion for photography.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep8
programme.desc: Clucky Day \ Take Me Out to the Fetch Game - Scooch is bummed out because hes missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When theres a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, its up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they dont have to forfeit.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep33
programme.desc: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind - When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a No-Paperworkist movement to avoid Buddy From HRs constant paperwork.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep33
programme.desc: Copy Cat - When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep33
programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out theres a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep33
programme.desc: Nepal: Yeti Or Not - When a Yeti is spotted in Nepal, chasing away all the locals, the Wanderers investigate only to find out its another Odlulu plot. They must work with Wizard Rockybeard to stop Yeti-Fritz get the Furball Key back

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep33
programme.desc: Battle - D-Structs becomes super-charged when Skrap-It installs a special spark bug, so the Trux must find their own spark bug to battle D-Structs' new power

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep33
programme.desc: Why Ants Work Together - You see there was a time when Ants didn't work together. The Ants desperately wanted to build themselves a home, but all the animals kept sitting on them, or sneezing them far away or swooping them up into tall trees! On the point of giving up, one brave, young soldier ant rallies the troops Pamoja! Together! Together they can do anything!!! and he was right. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky Penny / Hammys Day Out - Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now its up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep11
programme.desc: Tanaka's Moving Castle / Zenko Don't Go - Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep7
programme.desc: Ding Dong Day \ Grand Sam - Its Pawstons annual Take Your Kid to Work Day, and its Tags year to spend the day at the Doorbell Store with Paw. \ Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to complete an obstacle course in the woods.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep33
programme.desc: The Case Of The Disappearing Rainbow - It's Fable Forest Rainbow Day when the big rainbow in Fable Forest sparkles and pops like a giant firework. Everyone is looking forward to it until the colours start fading from the rainbow! Noddy needs to investigate before the rainbow disappears for good! Revs converts into a helicopter so that Noddy and Bumpy can fly over the rainbow to find the pot of rainbow gold. They discover that Cloppycorn has been taking the gold from the pot to give his unicorn horn a special golden glow. He didn't realise that the gold was the source of the rainbow colours. Noddy persuades Cloppycorn to return the gold to the pot and Rainbow Day goes ahead as planned. Everyone enjoys the gorgeous firework display from the rainbow. Good job, Noddy.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep33
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Hiccups - Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep5
programme.desc: Hang Ten in Tahiti - Wally and Wenda head to Tahiti to help Wizard Wavybeard find his lost Wave Key. Odlulu sees the Wave Key as her chance to become the best surfer in Tahiti and earn a statue of herself on the beach. The Wanderers and Odlulu have a surf-off, and the winner gets the key.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep45
programme.desc: Crew Detective/Whiplash Effect - Whiplash interrogates the crew to find out who broke his stuff; the crew tricks Whiplash into having a fun, new personality after he loses his memory.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep45
programme.desc: Gearwigs - Click-Clack climbs out of his comfort zone to make sure his ideas are heard when the Dinotrux hatch a plan to stop D-Structs from stealing supplies.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep45
programme.desc: Once Upon A Girl Day / Cop College - Tip and Oh join Chelsea and Apple for a "Girls Day"/When the Chicago cops discover that Kyle has been policing without a humans badge, they send him to Copy College

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep17
programme.desc: Lucky And The Field Trip Fraud - Lucky is determined to shed her reputation as teachers pet on the class field trip.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep18
programme.desc: Lucky And The Shaky Day - When an earthquake takes out the railroad bridge, the PALs must find a way to stop the oncoming train which Jim is aboard

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep39
programme.desc: Thunk O'clock High / The Croo-Gitive - Thunk must face a bully that's notorious for being an animal/The Croods flee after Grug is accused of robbing caves and stealing food for the Broods

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep40
programme.desc: A Few Good Grugs / Valley Shine Day - The Valley has the first try-all against the Croods to see if Grug stole food for the Broods; Thunk asks Kevin to teach him to be more irresistible

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - Theres a new babblist in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Babys help.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep71
programme.desc: Mi Amore Wing - Following the announcement of Dagur and Malas engagement Astrid questions her relationship with Hiccup. In the meantime the Riders battle Krogan over an unexpectedly placed lens

programme.desc: FOMO-OPUP / Lost in the Woods - Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swift's next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep307
programme.desc: The Runaway - When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Achy Breaky Art - Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep245
programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs / King Plankton - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison. // Plankton practices ruling the world by shrinking himself down and declaring himself king of SpongeBob's aquarium.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep269
programme.desc: Under the Small Top / Squidward's Sick Daze - Squidward's house becomes infested with a mail-order flea circus meant for SpongeBob. // Squidward fakes being sick to get out of work, but his agony only begins when SpongeBob arrives to care for him.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep116
programme.desc: House Hunting - The Star family house runs away from home.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep104
programme.desc: In Search of Camp Noodist / Kitchen Sponge - SpongeBob, Sandy, and Patrick hike through the woods in search of a fabled nudist colony. // SpongeBob helps Plankton at the Krusty Kanteen, leading to the development of a very familiar sandwich.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Say Smurf for the Camera!/Manners Matter - Handy invents a camera so Painter can make portraits of all the village's inhabitants. // Papa Smurf is nervous about the new Nature Fairy coming to visit so he asks Willow to teach the Smurfs manners.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep202
programme.desc: The Guest Who Wouldn't Leave/Where's My Smurfway? - After Wild sprains his ankle, he stays in Papa Smurf's house to recuperate while Papa Smurf is away. // When Blossom misplaces Brainy's beloved Smurfway, she has to find it before Brainy finds out.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Store Wars with the Casagrandes / Lucha Fever with the Casagrandes - When a fancy new grocery store opens on the block, Bobby rallies the family to do everything they can to compete. // Ronnie Anne fakes being sick to watch a Lubra Libre match, which proves to be more difficult than anticipated.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Present Tense / Any Given Sundae - Convinced that their scrapbook isn't good enough for Dad's birthday, the Loud kids seek out the perfect gift. // Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters

programme.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Weekend Story / Putty - Scissors helps Paper have a weekend interesting enough to impress Pencil. Even more exciting: Rock buys a hat. // Rock, Paper, and Scissors try to prove they shouldn't bereplaced by their incredible new friend, Putty.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Star Games - Patrick forces his entire family to participate in a series of different game show challenges.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Patrick Show Cashes In - In this ad-packed variety episode, The Patrick Show sells merchandise in order to fund its second season.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep160
programme.desc: Walking The Plankton - When Karen and Plankton see Mr. Krabs on the same cruise, Plankton starts wondering who's minding the Krabby Patty secret formula.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Headband - Mistaken for a Fire Nation School student, the disguised Aang is forced to enroll in a Fire nation school. Aang's hair helped to disguise him better with his head band.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Walk Don't Run - In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208
programme.desc: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over - Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep225
programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Key Limes / Six Pieces of Turkey - Our trio go on an unnecessarily action-packed adventure with Paper's sister, Sandpaper, to get seven key limes. // When Rock's TV dinner isn't as plentiful as advertised, he fights for justice. Scissors works for the company.

programme.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The First Lou Episode - To get their landlord to lower their rent, the trio tries to help him achieve his impossible dream.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep211
programme.desc: A Tigress Tale - When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace desides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Master and the Panda - When Po's friend Peng returns to the Valley of Peace, everyone is excited...except for Po. What no one else knows is that Peng is actually evil Tai Lung's nephew. Now Po has to admit to powerful Peng that he is the one who skadooshed his uncle.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Present Tense - As the annual Winter Festival approaches, Po doesn't have enough money to buy his dad the present he deserves, so he takes a job as a bounty hunter to capture a dangerous escaped convict for the reward. But Po's plan doesn't go as smooth as he hoped.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Best Laid Plaintains - It's a special day when Bada and Bing get a shipment of delicious plantains to eat. Although they jealously guard the African bananas, King Julien's determined to taste them too.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Mental Hen / Thumb Drive - A Delaware Blue Hen has taken up residence at the zoo, and she has the amazing ability to predict the future! // The penguins need a thumb, and Maurice's fits the bill nicely.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Antics on Ice / Showdown on Fairway 18 - The Lunacorns on Ice extravaganza is in town, and Skippers determined to take him as a treat. // A legendary putter is at the center of controversy when the Amarillo Kid returns to the zoo.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep320
