programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Josh Byrne meets an ornithologist to learn about supporting birds in backyards; Costa and junior gardener Caylee create magical miniature gardens; Sophie Thomson meets a group redistributing cafe waste to backyard composters.

programme.title: Palisa Anderson's Water Heart Food Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Palisa Anderson explores her passion for cooking with fresh, seasonal and local produce; she catches up with food author Christine Manfield and the renowned Peter Gilmore of Sydney's Quay Restaurant.

programme.title: Q+A Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 17 - Patricia Karvelas leads the conversation as citizens put their questions to local and international politicians and thought leaders. Q+A brings together a range of guests to debate the big issues affecting Australians.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - In the decades since the Korean war, over 200,000 children have been adopted to families worldwide. Now as adults, adoptees are demanding investigations into falsified documents, duplicate identities and even stolen children.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep77
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - In a special extended 90 minute edition of Afternoon Briefing on Budget Day, Greg Jennett brings you news and interviews live from Parliament House with the very latest on the Budget as we countdown to the Treasurer's Speech.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep97
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Kathryn Robinson brings you a comprehensive summary of today's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - For Dr Shiva and his psychologist wife Rima, incorporating the rich colours of their Indian heritage is an essential element for their new home in one of Adelaide's oldest and most conservative suburbs.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw Bitesize Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Chef Adam Liaw runs through the best tips and tricks on how to do a chicken in a pot whole, including how to stack vegetables for the best flavours.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep135
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and today's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: Budget 2024: The Treasurer's Speech Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Treasurer Jim Chalmers delivers his 2024 Federal Budget speech to Parliament.

programme.title: Budget 2024: A 7.30 Special Ep1

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the The Italian Dream Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep514FightingForMoreChitoVeraFighterFocusYazminJaureguiDayOneStephenThompson
programme.desc: Marlon Chito Vera doesn't fight for fame or glory; his rise in the UFC is has been dedicated to the pursuit of literally bringing a smile to his daughter's face. Tijuanas Yazmin Jauregui details journey to the Octagon and dreams of becoming the UFCs first female Mexican-born champ. Flashy striker Stephen "Wonderboy" Thompson looks back on his emphatic Octagon debut.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC281AdesanyavsPereir
programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 281 as middleweight champion Israel Adesanya faced former foe Alex Pereira. Plus, Carla Esparza had her first title defense against former champion Zhang Weili. See the entire main card, and more, of UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep6
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep5
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC 301: Pantoja vs. Erceg
programme.desc: Prelims - Rapidly turning into a dominant fighter settling in for a long reign at the top, UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil on Saturday, May 4, to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event of UFC 301 at Farmasi Arena in Rio de Janeiro. Winner of five in a row, Pantoja has been a man on a mission, and after a 2023 campaign in which he won and defended his title against Brandon Moreno and Brandon Royval, hes back to meet Erceg, who is perfect in three trips to the Octagon. Plus, the King of Rio returns to the Octagon, as UFC Hall of Famer Jose Aldo makes the walk for the first time since 2022 to face Jonathan Martinez
